availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Calhoun, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Elizabeth Jones. Married Nancy Jackson Jones in McLean County, Kentucky, on December 20, 1863. Farmer in Calhoun in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, Calhoun, p. 10. Kentucky, Compiled Marriages, 1851-1900 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 2001, marriage of George J. Jones and Nannie Jackson, McLean County, Kentucky, 20 Dec 1863, http://search.ancestry.com/cgi-bin/sse.dll?indiv=1&dbid=4428&h=109603&ssrc=pt&tid=108508978&pid=280067220540&usePUB=true (accessed 22 March 2017).
